atom.name: preamble
atom.field:
Implements an element with the given type.

structure UnitElt : ELEMENT  where type t = unit  
structure BoolElt : ELEMENT  where type t = bool

atom.name: costspec
atom.field:
Work Span
\(\texttt{equal}~(A,B)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\)
\(\texttt{compare}~(A,B)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\)
\(\texttt{hash}~(A,B)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\)
\(\texttt{toString}~(A,B)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\) \(O\left({1}\right)\)

atom.name: costspec
atom.field:
Work Span
\(\texttt{equal}~(A,B)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\min(|A|, |B|)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\min(|A|, |B|)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{compare}~(A,B)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\min(|A|, |B|)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\min(|A|, |B|)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{hash}~(A)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({|A|}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({|A|}\right)\)
\(\texttt{toString}~(A)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({|A|}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({|A|}\right)\)

atom.name: costspec
atom.field:
Work Span
\(\texttt{equal}~((A_1, A_2),(B_1, B_2))\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right), S_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right) \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{compare}~((A_1, A_2), (B_1, B_2))\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right), S_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right) \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{hash}~(A_1, A_2)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_2 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({S_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_1 \right) + S_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_2 \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{toString}~(A_1, A_2)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_2 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_1 \right), S_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_2 \right)\right)}\right)\)

atom.name: costspec
atom.field:
Work Span
\(\texttt{equal}~((A_1, A_2, A_3),(B_1, B_2, B_3))\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right) + W_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_3, B_3 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right), S_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right), S_{\texttt{equal}} \left( A_3, B_3 \right) \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{compare}~((A_1, A_2, A_3), (B_1, B_2, B_3))\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right) + W_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_3, B_3 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_1, B_1 \right), S_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_2, B_2 \right), S_{\texttt{compare}} \left( A_3, B_3 \right) \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{hash}~(A_1, A_2, A_3)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_2 \right) + W_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_3 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({S_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_1 \right) + S_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_2 \right) + S_{\texttt{hash}} \left( A_3 \right)}\right)\)
\(\texttt{toString}~(A_1, A_2)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({W_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_1 \right) + W_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_2 \right) + + W_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_3 \right)}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max \left( S_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_1 \right), S_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_2 \right), S_{\texttt{toString}} \left( A_3 \right)\right)}\right)\)

atom.name: costspec
atom.field:
Work Span
\(\texttt{equal}~(A,B)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\sum_{i=0}^{\min(|A|, |B|) - 1} W_{\texttt{equal}}(A[i], B[i])}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max_{i=0}^{\min(|A|, |B|) - 1} S_{\texttt{equal}} (A[i], B[i])}\right)\)
\(\texttt{compare}~(A,B)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\sum_{i=0}^{\min(|A|, |B|) - 1} W_{\texttt{compare}}(A[i], B[i])}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max_{i=0}^{\min(|A|, |B|) - 1} S_{\texttt{compare}} (A[i], B[i])}\right)\)
\(\texttt{hash}~(A)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\sum_{i=0}^{|A| - 1} W_{\texttt{hash}}(A[i])}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max_{i=0}^{|A| - 1} S_{\texttt{hash}} (A[i])}\right)\)
\(\texttt{toString}~(A)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\sum_{i=0}^{|A| - 1} W_{\texttt{toString}}(A[i])}\right)\) \(\displaystyle O\left({\max_{i=0}^{|A| - 1} S_{\texttt{tS}} (A[i])}\right)\)
